members.member:
\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Base class of graph control
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 图表显示控件基类

\~English
Graph data
\~Chinese
图表数据

\~English
Event of graph selecting
\~Chinese
图表控件被选择事件

\~English
Set control's scale
Control's scale, which ranges 1~8 \~Chinese
设置图表控件大小
控件大小，1为最小，8为最大

\~English
Create graph control
Graph definition Scale, which ranges 1~8 Created graph control \~Chinese
创建图表控件
图表定义 控件大小，1为最小，8为最大 新创建的图表控件

\~English
Register to use the specified type of control for graph data visualization
Graph definition ID Control type, which should be derived class of ASEva.UICoreWF.BaseGraph \~Chinese
注册指定ID的图表使用自定义可视化控件
图表定义ID 控件类型，必须为 ASEva.UICoreWF.BaseGraph 的子类

\~English
Whether control's height is fixed
Whether control's height is fixed \~Chinese
控件高度是否固定
控件高度是否固定

\~English
Update UI
\~Chinese
控件显示更新

\~English
Select the control
\~Chinese
选择图表控件

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Channel selector
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 通道选择器

\~English
Set whether the data of each channel is available
\~Chinese
设置各通道数据是否有效

\~English
Number of channels
\~Chinese
通道数量

\~English
The selected channel
\~Chinese
选中通道

\~English
Channel protocol, without '@x'
\~Chinese
通道协议，不需要加'@x'

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Circle indicator
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 圆形指示器

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Color type conversion
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 颜色类型转换

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) A channel selector based on combo box, which can display channel alias and whether the channel is available
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 基于组合框的通道选择器，集成输入通道别名和有效性显示

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) UI panel for configuration
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 配置界面控件，用于实现可视化配置

\~English
[Optional] Called while initializing panel's size
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在初始化控件尺寸时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while initializing the panel
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在配置界面控件初始化时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called before destroying the panel
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在配置界面控件销毁前被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while updating the panel's UI
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在需要更新界面时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called in the main loop, for running modal dialog
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行模态对话

\~English
(api:corewf=3.1.4) [Optional] Called in the main loop, for asynchronous calls
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.1.4) [可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行异步调用

\~English
Close the container holding the panel
\~Chinese
关闭配置界面

\~English
Implement closing the panel container in this event
\~Chinese
在此事件中实现配置界面的关闭

\~English
(api:corewf=3.2.0) Panel conversion tool
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.2.0) 面板转换工具

\~English
(api:corewf=3.2.2) Enable converting WPF panel to Winform panel
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.2.2) 启用WPF面板转Winform面板功能

\~English
(api:corewf=3.3.0) Enable converting Avalonia panel to Winform panel
The function to create AppBuilder object Whether initialization is successful \~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.3.0) 启用Avalonia面板转Winform面板功能
创建AppBuilder对象的函数 是否成功

\~English
Convert any window panel to Winform window panel
Any window panel Winform window panel, null if conversion failed \~Chinese
将任意窗口面板转化为Winform窗口面板
任意窗口面板 Winform窗口面板，若转化失败则返回null

\~English
Convert any config panel to Winform config panel
Any config panel Winform config panel, null if conversion failed \~Chinese
将任意配置面板转化为Winform配置面板
任意配置面板 Winform配置面板，若转化失败则返回null

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) A control to visualize sensor's coordinate system and position
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 传感器坐标系及位置等的可视化控件

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Double buffered ListView
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 双缓存ListView

\~English
(api:corewf=3.1.1) Extensions for common image object
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.1.1) 方便使用通用图像数据的扩展

\~English
Convert to Winform bitmap object
Common image object Winform bitmap object \~Chinese
转为Winform位图对象
通用图像数据 Winform位图对象

\~English
Convert to common image object
Winform bitmap object Common image object \~Chinese
转为通用图像数据
Winform位图对象 通用图像数据

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Extension for icon object generation
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 方便生成图标的扩展

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Wrapper of FlowLayoutPanel
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) FlowLayoutPanel封装

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Auto resize child controls of FlowLayoutPanel
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) FlowLayoutPanel子控件宽度自适应

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty instance of DataObject.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.Finalize
member.summary: Releases unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.ClearStorage
member.summary: Clears the internal storage array.
member.remarks: ClearStorage is called by the IDisposable.Dispose method implementation to make sure all unmanaged references are released properly.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.Dispose
member.summary: Releases resources.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases resources.
member.param: Indicates if the call was made by a managed caller, or the garbage collector. True indicates that someone called the Dispose method directly. False indicates that the garbage collector is finalizing the release of the object instance.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.DAdvise(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ADVF,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IAdviseSink,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Adds an advisory connection for the specified format.
member.param: The format for which this sink is called for changes.
Advisory flags to specify callback behavior.
The IAdviseSink to call for this connection.
Returns the new connection's ID.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.DUnadvise(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes an advisory connection.
member.param: The connection id to remove.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.EnumFormatEtc(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.DATADIR)
member.summary: Gets an enumerator for the formats contained in this DataObject.
member.param: The direction of the data.
member.returns: An instance of the IEnumFORMATETC interface.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.GetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)
member.summary: Gets the specified data.
member.param: The requested data format.
When the function returns, contains the requested data.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.GetDataHere(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)
member.summary: Gets the specified data.
member.param: The requested data format.
When the function returns, contains the requested data.
member.remarks: Differs from GetData only in that the STGMEDIUM storage is allocated and owned by the caller.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.QueryGetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@)
member.summary: Determines if data of the requested format is present.
member.param: The request data format.
member.returns: Returns the status of the request. If the data is present, S_OK is returned. If the data is not present, an error code with the best guess as to the reason is returned.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.SetData(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets data in the specified format into storage.
member.param: The format of the data.
The data.

If true, ownership of the medium's memory will be transferred to this object. If false, a copy of the medium will be created and maintained, and the caller is responsible for the memory of the medium it provided.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.CopyMedium(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM@)
member.summary: Creates a copy of the STGMEDIUM structure.
member.param: The data to copy.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.GetDataEntry(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM}@)
member.summary: Gets a data entry by the specified format.
member.param: The format to locate the data entry for.
The located data entry.
member.returns: True if the data entry was found, otherwise False.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.RaiseDataChanged(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM}@)
member.summary: Raises the DataChanged event for the specified connection.
member.param: The connection id.
The data entry for which to raise the event.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.RaiseDataChanged(System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM}@)
member.summary: Raises the DataChanged event for any advisory connections that are listening for it.
member.param: The relevant data entry.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.IsFormatCompatible(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC)
member.summary: Determines if the formats are compatible.
member.param: A FORMATETC.
A FORMATETC.
member.returns: True if the formats are compatible, otherwise False.
member.remarks: Compatible formats have the same DVASPECT, same format ID, and share at least one TYMED.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.IsFormatCompatible(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC@)
member.summary: Determines if the formats are compatible.
member.param: A FORMATETC.
A FORMATETC.
member.returns: True if the formats are compatible, otherwise False.
member.remarks: Compatible formats have the same DVASPECT, same format ID, and share at least one TYMED.

member.name: T:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.EnumFORMATETC
member.summary: Helps enumerate the formats available in our DataObject class.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.EnumFORMATETC.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STGMEDIUM}})
member.summary: Creates an instance from a list of key value pairs.
member.param: List of FORMATETC/STGMEDIUM key value pairs

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.EnumFORMATETC.#ctor(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC[])
member.summary: Creates an instance from an array of FORMATETC's.
member.param: Array of formats to enumerate.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.EnumFORMATETC.Clone(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IEnumFORMATETC@)
member.summary: Creates a clone of this enumerator.
member.param: When this function returns, contains a new instance of IEnumFORMATETC.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.EnumFORMATETC.Next(System.Int32,System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FORMATETC[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: Retrieves the next elements from the enumeration.
member.param: The number of elements to retrieve.
An array to receive the formats requested.
An array to receive the number of element fetched.
member.returns: If the fetched number of formats is the same as the requested number, S_OK is returned. There are several reasons S_FALSE may be returned: (1) The requested number of elements is less than or equal to zero. (2) The rgelt parameter equals null. (3) There are no more elements to enumerate. (4) The requested number of elements is greater than one and pceltFetched equals null or does not have at least one element in it. (5) The number of fetched elements is less than the number of requested elements.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.EnumFORMATETC.Reset
member.summary: Resets the state of enumeration.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DragDropLib.DataObject.EnumFORMATETC.Skip(System.Int32)
member.summary: Skips the number of elements requested.
member.param: The number of elements to skip.
member.returns: If there are not enough remaining elements to skip, returns S_FALSE. Otherwise, S_OK is returned.

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.DrawableHandler.#ctor(ASEva.UICoreWF.DrawableHandler.EtoDrawable)
member.summary: This is to allow instantiating a DrawableHandler from an existing control.

member.name: F:ASEva.UICoreWF.WebView2Handler.CoreWebView2Environment
member.summary: The default environment to use if none is specified with .

member.name: F:ASEva.UICoreWF.WebView2Handler.GetCoreWebView2Environment
member.summary: Specifies a function to call when we need the default environment, if not already specified

member.name: P:ASEva.UICoreWF.WebView2Handler.Environment
member.summary: Gets or sets the environment to use, defaulting to . This can only be set once during construction or with a style for this handler.
member.value: Environment to use to initialize WebView2

member.name: M:ASEva.UICoreWF.WebView2Handler.OnInitializeWebView2Async
member.summary: Override to use your own WebView2 initialization, if necessary

members.member:
\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Label table graph control
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 标签热力图数据可视化窗口

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Matrix table graph control
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 矩阵热力图数据可视化窗口

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Name editor control
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 名称编辑控件

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Set value to NumericUpDown control
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) NumericUpDown控件设置值

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Scatter points graph control
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 散点图数据可视化窗口

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Timeline visualization control (horizontal)
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 时间线显示控件（横向）

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Timeline visualization control (vertical)
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 时间线显示控件（纵向）

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) Single value graph control
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 单值数据可视化窗口

\~English
(api:corewf=3.0.0) UI panel for child window
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.0.0) 窗口控件，用于实现窗口组件的实际功能

\~English
[Optional] Called while initializing panel's size
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在初始化控件尺寸时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while initializing the panel
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在配置界面控件初始化时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while getting the configuration string
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 获取配置字符串时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while new data arrived. If there's a sample buffer, use ASEva.Sample.ClipWithBufferBegin to remove data outside the buffer range after adding new sample. In addition, since ASEva.WindowPanel.OnUpdateUI won't be called while the child window is hidden, you can use ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample to perform background processing (ManualTriggerSample's frequency is 50Hz)
New data, see ASEva.CommonWorkflow.OnInputData \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在获得新数据时被调用。如果存在样本缓存，则需要在添加至缓存后使用 ASEva.Sample.ClipWithBufferBegin 将缓存范围外数据移除。另外，由于窗口隐藏时将不会调用 ASEva.WindowPanel.OnUpdateUI ，所以可以在此函数中的data为 ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample 时进行后台处理（ManualTriggerSample频率为50Hz）
新数据，详见 ASEva.CommonWorkflow.OnInputData

\~English
[Optional] Called while needed to reset data buffer
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在需要重置数据缓存时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while starting a session
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在每轮开始时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while stopping a session
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在每轮结束时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while updating the panel's UI. All UI related updating should be put here. Note that this function won't be called when the child window is hidden
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在需要更新界面时被调用。所有与界面相关的更新应全部放在此函数内实现。需要注意，窗口隐藏时将不会调用此函数

\~English
[Optional] Called in the main loop, for running modal dialog
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行模态对话

\~English
(api:corewf=3.1.4) [Optional] Called in the main loop, for asynchronous calls
\~Chinese
(api:corewf=3.1.4) [可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行异步调用

\~English
[Optional] Called before destroying the panel
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在窗口控件销毁前被调用
